inclusion.criterion: Non-Hodgkin's lymphomas in the following categories: mediastinal gray zone lymphoma and primary mediastinal B cell lymphoma.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Diagnosis confirmed by staff of the Hematopathology Section, Laboratory of Pathology, NCI.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients greater than or equal to 12 years old.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Stage and Prognosis of Patients: Any stage for MGZL and PMBL.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Adequate major organ function [in adults: serum creatinine less than or equal to 1.5 mg/dl or creatinine clearance greater than 60 ml/min; and in children serum CR less than or equal to age-adjusted normal (age 12 to 15 maximum serum creatinine 1.2 mg/dl and age greater than 15 maximum serum creatinine 1.5 mg/dl); bilirubin less than 1.5 mg/dl; ANC greater than 1,000 and platelets greater than 100,000].
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: No active symptomatic ischemic heart disease, myocardial infarction or congestive heart failure within the past year.
inclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has a history of viral encephalitis/meningitis with ICH and seizure/stroke, which may be a contraindication for the regimen. However, this is not explicitly stated as an exclusion criterion.
